extension.name: editor4roks
extension.author: Marcos Rego
extension.description:
Plugin that adds the WYSIWYG HTML Editor to the custom descriptions of your Roksprocket Modules. With editor4roks activated the descriptions will be easier to edit and the links easier to put directly on the modules.

editor4roks Roksprocket on RocketTheme website NicEdit editor website

This is not an official plugin of RocketTheme.
editor4roks is released under the GNU/GPL v2 license.

field.name: editoroption
field.label: Editor
field.description: With 'Joomla Default' you will be able to use the default editor selected in 'Global Configuration' but this will also change the method to insert images inside Roksprocket. Choose the editor 'NicEdit' if you prefer to use the default Media Manager for selecting images.

field.name: roks4mob
field.label: roks4mob
field.description: When enabled, Roksprocket's layout will be more friendly on mobile devices.
